articles.description: Badminton News: Two-time Commonwealth Games gold medallist Saina Nehwal on Thursday questioned the timing of selection trials and slammed the Badminton Association of
articles.content:
Surprised to see all the articles stating that I dont want to defend my CWG title and my Asiad medal. Im just not https://t.co/dtvZJfyQTi
— Saina Nehwal (@NSaina) 1649922650000
